commit.message:
Remove the comments wrt not appending EXTRA_CFLAGS to JVM_CFLAGS

Signed-off-by: Patrick Zhang <patrick@os.amperecomputing.com>

Fixed a typo

Signed-off-by: Patrick Zhang <patrick@os.amperecomputing.com>

Added comments to describe why EXTRA_CFLAGS is excluded from JVM_CFLAGS

Signed-off-by: Patrick Zhang <patrick@os.amperecomputing.com>

Revert the changes of adding new params to SetupNativeCompilation

Signed-off-by: Patrick Zhang <patrick@os.amperecomputing.com>

STATIC_LIB_CFLAGS in Flags.gmk should be updated to -DSTATIC_BUILD=1 too

Signed-off-by: Patrick Zhang <patrick@os.amperecomputing.com>

precompiled.hpp.gch should be compiled with EXTRA_CXXFLAGS

Signed-off-by: Patrick Zhang <patrick@os.amperecomputing.com>

8352284: EXTRA_CFLAGS incorrectly applied to BUILD_LIBJVM src/hotspot C++ source files

Signed-off-by: Patrick Zhang <patrick@os.amperecomputing.com>
